attributes.action: object to local health authorities charging staff to park on  hospital sites just so that they can attend their jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should NHS staff have to pay to go to work. Many hospital staff travel long distances to get to work and public transport is not always available especially in semi rural areas and because of shift work and less buses and trains running at certain times of the day. Many hospital workers are already under paid as it is and often feel undervalued. Might as well work for one of the big super markets instead

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
